Liste des professeurs

Pas de professeur
import {Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {Teacher} from "../../model/teacher.model"; import {SchoolService} from "../school.service"; import {ActivatedRoute} from "@angular/router"; @Component({ selector: 'app-teacher-list', templateUrl: './teacher-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./teacher-list.component.css'] }) export class TeacherListComponent implements OnInit{ teachers: Teacher[] = [] constructor(private schoolServ: SchoolService, private activatedRoute: ActivatedRoute) { } ngOnInit(): void { const id = this.activatedRoute.snapshot.paramMap.get("sId") || ""; if (id != '') { this.schoolServ.findAllTeacherBySchool(+id).subscribe(v => this.teachers = v) } } }
